Notes: Originally known as El Pueblo de San José de Guadalupe, the first town in the Spanish colony of Nueva California, which later became Alta California.
Grew from Fort Nelson, established by explorer George Rogers Clark.
Later organized as the lost State of Franklin with Jonesborough as capital 1784.
1785 fur trading post. 1877 Battleford is capital of the North West Territories. North Battleford incorporated as a city (population 5000+) 1913.
Grew from the French Fort Presque Isle.
Grew from the American Fort Craig.
